subject: Steroids
Mitchell Report (Baseball)
Baseball
Decisions and Verdicts
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Thursday ruled that some interview notes regarding Roger Clemens’s alleged use of performance-enhancers were not protected as work product privilege.
snippet: A federal judge on Thursday ruled that some interview notes regarding Roger Clemens’s alleged use of performance-enhancers were not protected as work product privilege.
